directions: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook the onion and garlic in the hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes. Stir the tomatoes, red pepper flakes, vinegar, and sugar into the onion and garlic mixture; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until the flavors blend to your liking, 45 to 60 minutes. Stir the basil into the sauce; season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste
3/4 cup basil leaves, torn into pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Tomato and Basil Pasta Sauce
